scripts.test:tape:cover: find src -iname '*.test.js' | NODE_ENV=test xargs node_modules/.bin/nyc node test/tap.js
scripts.test:tape:watch: find src -iname '*.test.js' | xargs nodemon --exec babel-node -- test/tap.js
scripts.d:build: npm run d:rmi; docker build -t makst/notes-node .
scripts.d:run: npm run d:rm; docker run -it --name=notes-node -v $(pwd):/app makst/notes-node
scripts.d:babel:build: npm run d:run -- npm run babel:build
scripts.d:debug: npm run d:rm; docker run -it --name=notes-node -v $(pwd):/app -p 9229:9229 makst/notes-node node_modules/.bin/babel-node --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9229
scripts.d:debug:watch: npm run d:rm; docker run -it --name=notes-node -v $(pwd):/app -p 9229:9229 makst/notes-node nodemon --inspect-brk=0.0.0.0:9229
scripts.d:test:faucet: npm run d:run -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run test:tape | node_modules/.bin/faucet'
scripts.d:test:faucet:watch: npm run d:run -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run test:tape:watch | node_modules/.bin/faucet'
scripts.d:test:tap:spec: npm run d:run -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run test:tape | node_modules/.bin/tap-spec'
scripts.d:test:tap:spec:watch: npm run d:run -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run test:tape:watch | node_modules/.bin/tap-spec'
scripts.d:test:integration: npm run d:run -- /bin/sh -c 'npm run test:integration:tape | node_modules/.bin/faucet'
